docs.text: Home Welcome to my website! I'm a dual-degree BS/MS student at Haverford College and Bryn Mawr College interested in Physics, ML, and Computing. This site contains information about my personal projects, research, and self-guided study in ML, CS, and physics. See notes, problem sets, and code.
